title: I cant Play LoL. (Http error)
body: I just downloaded LoL for the first time and I was excited to play! Until the *HTTP ERROR* occurred.I have tried everything and it still didn't work. I downloaded it twice and it still didn't work. Help me!

replies.body: I'm not aware of any common HTTP errors. Was this something related to Cloudflare? Can you take a screenshot and upload it to [Imgur](https://imgur.com/) and link it here?
